projects.title: Beeswax
projects.description: Skill-sharing app created mainly for Hive Helsinki students - to facilitate networking within the school in a fun and natural way. The service utilizes the 42 API for authentification.

projects.title: sannasilander
projects.description: Personal portfolio for stylist Sanna Silander. The client wanted a simplistic website with a clear focus on the work - with the aim to drive traffic to her Instagram for enquiries. Responsiveness was a major concern as most of her potential clients would be browsing on mobile devices.

projects.title: islajournal
projects.description: Second issue of Fashion Zine ISLA Journal - transformed to a digital format due to Covid-19 restrictions which made traditional fashion editing problematic. The client provided the designs, so the emphasis during the work was to realize the artists' vision to the T, and bring it to life on desktop as well as on mobile.

projects.title: FDF
projects.description: The task was to create a program that takes in an array of xyz-coordinates and projects them to a 3D plane. The project is written entirely in C, so memory management was crucial to ensure zero memory leakage. The starting point is an isometric projection, but the program allows for rotations around all axis.
